Question: This person was noted as "one of the key figures in the history of jazz".
Hints: This person soon began to take over the compositional duties of his sidemen.
Despite all the personal turmoil, the 1950–54 period was actually quite fruitful for this person artistically.
In 1974 and 1975, Columbia recorded three double-LP live this person albums: Dark Magus, Agharta, and Pangaea.
